verses.roman:
taraṅge vahiyā phire,--yena śuṣka kāṣṭha
ke bujhite pāre ei caitanyera nāṭa?

synonyms: taraṅge—the waves; vahiyā phire—carry here and there; yena—like; śuṣka kāṣṭha—a piece of dry wood; ke—who; bujhite pāre—can understand; ei—this; caitanyera nāṭa—dramatic performance of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: The waves carried Him here and there like a piece of dry wood. Who can understand this dramatic performance by Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu?
